ai-atk-s0501a7:84_3: For just as the simile of the manner says, “He is called an indication,” and in the same position as it is given in a moment, thus it is called “position” .
ai-atk-s0501a7:84_4: Such a one gives a gift to one who is standing, walking, standing, sitting, or lying down in the next world. And on what is said to be ‘with its next world’ and ‘with its gods’, being fettered’, is said to be ‘giving’ in achievement’.
ai-atk-s0501a7:84_5: With this conception of the meaning and the simile of the meaning is born.
ai-atk-s0501a7:86_0: the Fortunate One is shown by the King, by the southern branch –
ai-atk-s0501a7:87_0: “I’ve given a gift to a Community, well placed in the Saṅgha,
ai-atk-s0501a7:88_0: is of benefit to them for a long time, immediately it is of benefit.”

ai-atk-s0501a7:95_0: Then the relatives of the Dhamma, Vāseṭṭha, finding subdued the Buddha with this verse:
ai-atk-s0501a7:95_1: For the lazy of relatives is shown in accordance with the Dhamma . And the chiefs have been worshipped by this reference to the highest worship.
ai-atk-s0501a7:95_2: lofty praise, they should encourage them to make offerings:
ai-atk-s0501a7:95_3: how the mendicants live with a Dhamma talk connected with them.

ai-atk-s0501a7:95_5: and no little merit has been produced by you by this merit.
ai-atk-s0501a7:95_6: For the means of abundant merit is the same as that of the rainy season residence was used in a gift embracing of the meritorious actions, as well as in the case of the blooming field, which carries off the crowd of the people.
